mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRY_ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED) VALUES (INQUIRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{inquiryContent}, SYSDATE)
